title: OYO joins hand with Khelo India and others to support differently-abled talent across country
description: OYO, in collaboration with Khelo India Para Games, Divyang Kala Mela, and other organisations, is set to provide specialized and accessible accommodation for differently-abled players nationwide, according to the company's press release. In its official statement, the multinational hospitality chain pledged to implement wheelchair-friendly infrastructure, including ramps, wider doorways, and trained staff attuned to the needs of differently-abled guests in its partner hotels.
